attributes.action: bring back capital punishment for serious crimes commited in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Capital punishment should be brought back into play within the UK.

Since it's abolishment in 1969, the UK has seen a substancial rise in SERIOUS crimes commited and people murdered.

The only way that the UK is going to be able to reduce criminals from committing serious crimes is by enforcing a real deterrant, that being capital punishment. 

Prison sentances are not enough to prevent criminals from commiting these serious crimes (terrorism, murder, paedophilia etc).

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
